author: Teemperor
body:
This patch makes the headers parsable on their own by adding
the necessary includes to resolve all referenced types.

It adds an include to:
* SuperClusterFwd.h for the class SuperClusterCollection
* Point3D.h for the class math::XZYPoint
* EcalRecHitCollections.h for the class EcalRecHitCollection
* BasicClusterFwd.h for the class BasicClusterCollection
title: Fix includes in RecoEcal/EgammaClusterProducers
